description: this is a skeleton definition of a Property
title: PAR Property

parPropertyName.description: Property Name is a specific property, e.g. fmt/43, MD5, SHA512, PASS, FAIL, number of bytes etc.

parPropertyType.description: Property Type is the class into which a specific property falls, e.g. fmt/43 is a file format, MD5 and SHA512 are both checksums, PASS and FAIL are both format validity measures.
